Text: North Georgia mountains:  The mountains in this region are in the Blue Ridge mountain chain that ends in Georgia.

2:
--------------------
Text: North Georgia mountains:  At over 1 billion years of age, the Blue Ridge mountains are among the oldest mountains in the United States and sometimes mistaken to be the oldest mountains in the world (they are only about one third of the age of South Africa's 3.6 billion year old Barberton greenstone belt.)
